Articles.Content:
Now the reason I've posted here and not in the support is because i dont want help I'mjustm confused.

Anyway I made a replica of the Salyut 7 qnd put it in a 180 x 180km orbit and then launched my Soyuz replica and put it in a 720 x 720km orbit then I for rendezvous.

Whe I aligned orbits I found the stations orbit changed to 635 x 99km.

Has anyone else encountered this and once again i dont want help im asking if anyone else has had this.
I have had something like this before, have you any mods installed. I know that BahamutoD's armory causes loss of speed when the physics range is set above 2.5km.
Hmm that could be it, fixed the orbit with hyperedit

I've encountered minor deviations in orbits when I leave physics on / timewarp off for a while, or if I use physics warp while in space, but nothing more than a kilometer or two at worst. Did you perhaps rendezvous really fast while using physics warp over and over again? xD
No extremely slow rv and the salyut orbit obviously changed after i left it. Ill see what happens when i launch Skylab to dock with it and then finally Apollo
